attributes.action: Police too do mandatory checks on phones if in any car accident (Both Parties)
attributes.background: recently I was in an accident where they were using there phone - however police didn't feel the need too check due too vialating personal human rights. personally I feel this could have helped my case and I'm sure there are plenty of others in my situation.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
